summary: Relating to the Municipal Garbage Utility; providing for the acquisition by condemnation of certain property in Blocks 7, 17 & 18, 1st Addition to River Park, and in the SE 1/4 of section 19, township 24 north, range 4 east, W.M., for refuse receiving and transfer sites, as an acquisition for, and addition and betterment to and extension of the municipal refuse collection and disposal system and plant; providing for payment therefor and for expenses of the Law and Engineering Depts. in connection with said acquisition.
